titles.title: Raising a question of the privileges of the House.
Raising a question of the privileges of the House.

action.text: QUESTION OF THE PRIVILEGES OF THE HOUSE - The Chair recognized Mr. McCarthy to offer a resolution raising a question of the privileges of the House. The Clerk reported the text of the resolution.
Mr. Hoyer moved to table the measure.

vote.text: On motion to table the measure Agreed to by recorded vote: 222 - 184 (Roll no. 555).

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption
Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary: This resolution disapproves the actions of the Speaker of the House, Representative Nancy Pelosi, to initiate an impeachment inquiry against President Trump without any debate or vote by the full House on an impeachment inquiry resolution.
